maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Hey Lea!\. Please don't just run off like that, d'accord?\. We're over here!

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Petits Pains Chauds

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Hoi!\.\. We're not set up yet, but we're giving it our all to deliver the bestest foods as soon as we can!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Hoy !\.\. On est pas encore prêt, mais on fait tout ce qu'on peut pour pouvoir bientôt vous servir la plus meilleure des nourritures !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Come back later, yeah?!\. It will be amazing, just you watch!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Revenez plus tard, yeah ?!\. Ça sera génial, vous verrez !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Rookina Buffs
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Buffs de Rookina

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Ah, hello.\. I'm sorry, but we haven't properly prepared our shop yet.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ah, bonjour.\. Je suis désolée, mais notre étal n'est pas encore vraiment prêt.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Please visit us later to get a taste of our high-quality foods.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Vous devriez nous rendre visite plus tard, pour goûter nos plats gastronomiques.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Sorry \v[lore.title.seeker], but this shop isn't ready yet.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Désolé \v[lore.title.seeker], mais cet étal est encore en construction.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Come back later if you want to get some revitalizing tea.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Revenez plus tard si vous souhaitez savourer du thé revitalisant.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: So many options...
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Tellement de choix...

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Je ne sais pas par où commencer...

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ark

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Good work finding this spot.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Tu as trouvé le chemin jusqu'ici. Pas mal !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Did you know that these treasure chests are instanced for each player?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Est-ce que tu savais que ces coffres aux trésors sont instanciés pour chaque joueur ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Oh well... it means I opened this treasure chest myself before.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Bon OK... Ça veut dire que je l'ai déjà ouvert ce trésor, auparavant.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: The content is replicated for each player.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Le contenu est répliqué pour chaque joueur.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: That's cool, right? No more annoying empty chests because some random player reached it before you!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: C'est vraiment cool, non ? Il n'y a plus ces coffres agaçants qui sont vides uniquement parce qu'un autre joueur l'a trouvé avant toi !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Yeah.... anyway, gotta meet my friends at the entrance.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ouais... bon faut que j'y aille. Je vais voir des amis à l'entrée.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Heh, you reached this spot. Not bad!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Oha, tu as trouvé le chemin jusqu'ici. Pas mal !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: No reason to hold back. Go claim your prize!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Pas besoin de te retenir. Prends ce que tu mérites !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Hu-huh...

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: J'irais bien au marché plus tard~

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Hu-huh...

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Hu-huh...

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Hu-huh...

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig:
If you put water into a fountain...
It becomes the fountain.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text:
Si vous mettez de l'eau dans une fontaine...
alors elle devient la fontaine.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: You just jumped into the fountain, didn't you?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Tu viens de sauter dans la fontaine, non ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: That's not how you become water, my friend.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ce n'est pas comme cela que l'on devient de l'eau, mon amie.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Be water, my friend.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Sois de l'eau, mon amie.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: What is it? You learned the \c[3]Wave\c[0] element?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Qu'est-ce qu'il y a ? Tu as appris l'Élément \c[3]Onde\c[0] ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Wave doesn't make you water, my friend.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: L'onde ne fait pas de toi de l'eau, mon amie.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Clearly waves are merely an aspect of water, as it is of sound and more.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Clairement, les ondes ne sont qu'une facette de l'eau, tout comme pour le son et d'autres.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Really...\. What even is wave? Such nonsense.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Vraiment...\. Qu'est-ce qu'une onde ? Quelle absurdité.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Water is what you need to be.\. Water and only water.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: L'eau est tout ce que tu as besoin d'être.\. De l'eau, rien que de l'eau.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Frosty Arnold
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Glaces Arnold

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Joe's
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Chez Joe

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Frosty Arnold
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Glaces Arnold

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Hello there, young lady!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Bonjour, jeune demoiselle !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Could I interest you in some cool and delicious ice cream?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Seriez-vous intéressée par une bonne glace fraiche et délicieuse ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Well... unfortunately we are out of stock right now.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Hé ben... on est actuellement en rupture de stock, hélas.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: But, if you bring me some \c[3]fresh ice from Bergen Trail\c[0], I could quickly produce new ice cream.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Mais, si vous me ramenez de la \c[3]glace fraiche du \v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0], je pourrais vous en faire une rapidement.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: So... could you bring me some \c[3]Bergen Ice\c[0]? About \c[3]5\c[0] should suffice.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Donc... Pourriez-vous me ramener de la \c[3]Glace de Bergen\c[0] ? \c[3]5 portions\c[0] devrait me suffire.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Great!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Super !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: You can find \c[3]Bergen Ice\c[0] in the snowy parts of \c[3]Bergen Trail\c[0].\. Just continue to the west until you reach the mountain area.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Vous pourrez trouver de la \c[3]Glace de Bergen\c[0] dans la partie enneigée du \c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0].\. Continuez sur la gauche jusqu'à ce que vous arriviez à la montagne.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Did they seriously ask you to fetch ice from a distant mountain?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Est-ce qu'ils t'ont vraiment demandé d'aller chercher de la glace sur une montagne loin d'ici ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: What is this, the middle ages?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: On a atterri au Moyen Âge ou quoi ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [shakes head]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Oh, that's too bad. Maybe another time!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Oh, dommage. Peut-être une prochaine fois !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Frosty Arnold
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Glaces Arnold

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Hm... it seems you don't have enough \c[3]Bergen Ice\c[0] yet. I need about \c[3]5 pieces\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Hm... on dirait que vous n'avez pas encore assez de \c[3]Glace de Bergen\c[0]. J'ai besoin d'exactement \c[3]5 portions\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: You can find \c[3]Bergen Ice\c[0] in the snowy parts of \c[3]Bergen Trail\c[0]. Just continue to the west until you reach the mountain area.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Vous pourrez trouver de la \c[3]Glace de Bergen\c[0] dans la partie enneigée du \c[3]\v[area.bergen-trails.name]\c[0]. Continuez sur la gauche jusqu'à ce que vous arriviez a la montagne.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Frosty Arnold
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Glaces Arnold

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Oh, you brought me the \c[3]Bergen Ice\c[0]! Thank you so much!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Oh, vous m'avez apporté la \c[3]Glace de Bergen\c[0] ! Merci beaucoup !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: And here's your ice cream! Don't eat it all at once, it might make your head hurt!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Et voilà votre cornet de glace ! Ne mangez pas tout d'un coup, sinon vous aurez mal à la tête !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: You know what? They could have declared "Bergen Ice" a speciality.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Tu sais quoi ? Ils auraient dû déclarer "Glace de Bergen" comme une spécialité locale.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: That would explain why you would have to go so far just to fetch it.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ça permettrait d'expliquer pourquoi il faudrait aller les chercher aussi loin.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: People perform all kinds of elaborate tasks, because it is a speciality, do they not?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Les gens ne lésinent pas à la tâche pour préparer une spécialité, non ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Well, nevermind. I am not a game designer.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Oui bon, peu importe, je ne suis pas un développeur de jeu vidéo

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Frosty Arnold
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Glaces Arnold

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Thanks for helping me out!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Merci pour m'avoir aidé !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Ice cream sure sells quickly when the weather is right.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Les crèmes glacées se vendent très bien quand il fait beau.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: I'm sorry, the northern part is currently under construction.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Je suis désolé, la partie nord-est actuellement en cours de construction.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: It will open up to the public with the next content update!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Elle ouvrira au public lors de la prochaine mise à jour du contenu !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Sorry, the northern part of the town is blocked due to construction.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Je suis désolé, la partie nord-est actuellement fermée pour cause de travaux.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: It will be open again in a future update!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Elle rouvrira à la prochaine mise à jour du contenu !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: I'm really looking forward to the next content patch.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Je suis impatient de voir la prochaine mise à jour du contenu.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: I heard rumors about a black market!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: J'ai entendu des rumeurs à propos d'un marché noir !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Yeah~
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ouais~

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: By the way, does it make sense to call it a "patch"?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: D'ailleurs, est-ce que c'est logique d'appeler ça une "mise à jour" ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: I mean it's not just code. They're doing actual construction work over there.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Je veux dire, ce n'est pas seulement du code. Ils doivent vraiment faire des travaux là.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: It's just a habit from old virtual MMOs. Don't overthink it.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: C'est juste une habitude des vieux MMOs virtuels. N'y pense pas trop.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Yeah. I'm also still waiting for that kitchen patch.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Oui. J'attends aussi pour la mise à jour de la cuisine

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: What?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Hein ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: My sink is broken. Landlord's gotta patch that!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Mon évier est cassé. Faut que le proprio mette à jour ça !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Stop it, you're making my brain hurt.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Arrête ça, tu me files mal au crâne.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Where are you going Lea?\. We're over here!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Où est-ce que tu vas Lea ?\. On est là !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: D'Kar
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: D'Kar

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Oh dear!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Oh bon sang !
... Salut...

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Hmpf, didn't your father tell you not to startle people?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Hmpf, est-ce que ton père ne t'a jamais dit de ne pas faire peur aux gens ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [shakes head]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Well... \.\. He clearly should have!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Eh bien... \.\. Il aurait vraiment dû le faire !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Kids these days, don't know their manners!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Les gamins de nos jours, ils ne connaissent plus les bonnes manières !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Now now, don't be sad, young lady.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Boh, non, ne sois pas triste, jeune dame.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: At least you look like you are actually sorry.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Au moins on dirait que tu es vraiment désolée.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Now that's better!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: C'est déjà mieux !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Hmmmmm\..\..\..
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Mmmmmm\..\..\..

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: I think I like your attitude.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Je pense que j'apprécie ton comportement.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Look, if you want to make up for startling me, why not help me out?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Bon, si tu veux te faire pardonner pour m'avoir effrayé, peut-être que tu pourrais me donner un coup de main ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Now don't look at me like that. It's not hard at all. All I want you to do is find me a \c[3]\v[item.133.name]\c[0]. Simple enough, right?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ne me regarde pas comme ça. Ce n'est vraiment pas difficile. Tout ce que je souhaite, c'est que tu me trouves des \c[3]\v[item.133.name]\c[0]. C'est simple, non ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Very good. Someone told me it was hidden in \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Très bien. Quelqu'un m'a dit qu'ils étaient cachés à \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Apparently there is an area where you have to defeat lots of \c[3]\v[combat.name.hedgehog]s\c[0] while it's raining.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: J'ai cru comprendre qu'il y a un endroit où il faut battre un grand nombre de \c[3]\v[combat.name.hedgehog]s\c[0] pendant qu'il pleut.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Do you think you can find it?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Est-ce que tu penses que tu peux les trouver ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Good to hear! But don't keep me waiting, alright?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: C'est bon de l'entendre ! Mais ne me fais pas attendre trop longtemps, hein ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [shakes head]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: What? Young lady, I expected more of you!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Quoi ? J'en attendais mieux, jeune dame !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: But, I'll give you another chance, so come back when you are ready to redeem yourself.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Mais je vais te donner une seconde chance. Reviens me voir lorsque tu es prête à te faire pardonner.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Aha! Look who's back. Are you ready to help me now, young lady?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Haha ! Regarde qui est revenue. Est-ce que tu es prête à m'aider, maintenant ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Very good. Someone told me it was hidden in \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Très bien. Quelqu'un m'a dit qu'il était caché à \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Apparently there is an area where you have to defeat lots of \c[3]\v[combat.name.hedgehog]s\c[0] while it's raining.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: J'ai cru comprendre qu'il y a un endroit où il faut battre un grand nombre de \c[3]\v[combat.name.hedgehog]\c[0] pendant qu'il pleut.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Do you think you can find it?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Est-ce que tu penses que tu peux les trouver ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Good to hear! But don't keep me waiting alright?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: C'est bon à entendre ! Mais ne me fais pas attendre trop longtemps, hein ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [shakes head]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: What? Still nothing? My patience has its limits!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Quoi ? Toujours pas ? Ma patience a des limites !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Welcome back young lady. Did you find the \c[3]\v[item.133.name]\c[0] yet?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Oh, rebonjour, jeune dame ! Est-ce que tu as déjà trouvé les \c[3]\v[item.133.name]\c[0] ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Oh, that's unfortunate. I do hope you find it.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Oh, c'est dommage. J'espère que tu les trouveras bientôt.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Some player told me it was hidden in \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Un joueur m'a dit qu'ils étaient cachés à \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Apparently there is an area where you have to defeat lots of \c[3]\v[combat.name.hedgehog]s\c[0] while it's raining.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: J'ai cru comprendre qu'il y a un endroit où il faut battre un grand nombre de \c[3]\v[combat.name.hedgehog]\c[0] pendant qu'il pleut.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Welcome back young lady. Did you find the \c[3]\v[item.133.name]\c[0] yet?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ho, rebonjour, jeune dame ! Est-ce que tu as déjà trouvé les \c[3]\v[item.133.name]\c[0] ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Really!?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Vraiment !?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: This is...\.\.\. very good.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: C'est...\.\.\. très bien.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: I knew I could count on you.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Je savais que je pouvais compter sur toi.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Such a fine young lady with expert listening skills.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Une si jeune dame qui sait tellement bien écouter.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Thanks a lot. I even have a little something for you as a reward!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Merci beaucoup. J'ai même apporté une petite récompense pour toi !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Oh, I never asked you for your name!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Oh, je ne vous ai jamais demandé votre nom !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Ketin D'Kar
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ketin D'Kar

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: I'm \c[3]D'kar\c[0]. \.\.\. \c[3]Ketin D'Kar\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Je suis \c[3]D'kar\c[0].\.\.\. \c[3]Ketin D'Kar\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Lea, Hi!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Lea, Salut !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Well, I'm not good with long goodbyes, so let's keep this one short.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Bon, je n'ai jamais été bon avec les longs "au revoir", donc faisons court.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Bye!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Bye !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Bye...
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Bye...

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: That man just now... \.\.\. He looked like he was wearing gear from each class.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Cet homme-là... \.\.\. On dirait qu'il portait des équipements de toutes les classes.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Normally that should not be possible. I wonder how he managed to sneak this past the developers.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Normalement ça ne devrait pas être possible. Je me demande comment ça a pu échapper aux développeurs.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: This is for me, right?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: C'est pour moi, c'est ça ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: I really love all these gifts, but I sure would like to know where they're coming from.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: J'aime vraiment beaucoup ces cadeaux, mais j'aimerais bien savoir qui me les envoie.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Where did you get this?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ou c'est que tu les as trouves ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Alright, I don't know what you mean.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: J'ai aucune idée de ce que tu as cherché à me dire.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Just forget I asked. I'll find out myself.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Bon, oublie cette question. Je le découvrirais moi-même.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Alright, next stop, the town center!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: OK, prochain arrêt : le centre de la ville !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Oh, is that a market over there?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Oh, c'est un marché là-bas ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Japp!\. You'll find most of the \c[3]traders\c[0] around here.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Japp !\. Vous trouverez la majorité des \c[3]marchands\c[0] dans les environs.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: ...Well, they're all over the place to be frank.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: ... Bon, pour être honnête, ils sont vraiment étalés partout.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Those traders offer \c[3]pretty good equipment\c[3].
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ces marchands proposent du \c[3]très bon équipement\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: The catch: you first need to collect all the \c[3]required trade items\c[0] in the wild.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: La contrepartie : vous devez aller chercher tous les \c[3]objets demandés en échange\c[0] dans la nature.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: It takes time, but it's worth it.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ça prend du temps, mais ça vaut vraiment le coup.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Further up is another important building.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Plus loin, il y a un autre bâtiment important.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: This way!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Par là !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Well you pretty much already have \c[1]all the equipment\c[0], so....
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Oui bon, tu as déjà un peu \c[1]tous les équipements\c[0], donc...

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: See that building up there?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Vous voyez ce bâtiment-là ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: That's the \c[3]Seeker Hub\c[0] or \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: C'est le \c[3]Repère des \v[lore.title.seeker]s\c[0] ou \c[3]Carrefour des Quêtes\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Surprise, you'll find a lot of \c[3]quests\c[0] there!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Surprise, vous y trouverez de nombreuses \c[3]quêtes\c[0] !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: ... Just like in many other places in town and elsewhere.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: ... Comme vous en trouverez dans d'autres endroits en ville ou ailleurs.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: All those quests are optional, but the rewards usually make it worthwhile.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Toutes ces quêtes sont optionnelles, mais les récompenses valent généralement le coup.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Hey Lea, are you still with us?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Hé Lea, t'es encore avec nous ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Oui, she's a quiet one.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Oui, elle est un peu timide.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: But she was really fast at the tutorial, almost beat me to it!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Mais elle a été vraiment rapide au tutoriel, elle m'a quasiment battu !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Well like they say -\. still waters run deep, right?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Bah, qu'est-ce qu'on dit déjà ?\. Les eaux calmes sont des eaux profondes, c'est ça ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Uhm...\. wait a moment.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Heu...\. Attends un peu.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: You are... \c[1]level \v[player.level]\c[0]?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Tu es... \c[1]niveau \v[player.level]\c[0] ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Yeah...\. her level is strange.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Oui...\. son niveau est un peu étrange.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Are you sure she just started the game as well?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Tu es sûre qu'elle vient vraiment de commencer le jeu ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Oui.\. I saw her on Newcomer's Bridge, between the dungeons.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Oui.\. Je l'ai vu sur le Pont des Nouveaux Arrivants, entre les donjons.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Gotta be honest, this sounds \c[1]kinda fishy\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Pour être honnête, ça me semble \c[1]un peu louche\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Come on! You always worry too much about the details!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Roh, allez ! Tu t'inquiètes toujours pour des petits détails !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Anyway!\. What about that main quest?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Bon pas grave !\. Sinon, pour la quête principale, il faut faire quoi ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Oui, oui.\. What about that main quest?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Oui oui.\. Sinon, pour la quête principale, il faut faire quoi ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: They kept talking about the \c[3]Track of the Ancients\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ils nous parlent constamment du \c[3]\v[lore.title.track-of-ancients]\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Oh right, I almost forgot about that.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ah oui, j'avais presque oublié.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: You'll have to enter the Quest Hub, anyway.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Il faut de toute façon que vous alliez au Carrefour des Quêtes.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: There is a mandatory introduction for all new players.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ils y donnent une présentation, qui est obligatoire pour les nouveaux joueurs.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: They'll explain all about it there.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ils vont tout vous expliquer là-bas.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: I suggest you go in right away and just get it over with.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Je propose que vous y alliez tout de suite histoire que ça soit fait.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: I'll just wait here.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Je vais juste vous attendre ici.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: D'accord!\. Let's go, Lea!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: D'accord !\. Allons-y, Lea !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Listen to the \c[3]Mandatory Introduction\c[0] inside the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0] of Rookie Harbor. It's mandatory.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Écoutez la \c[3]Présentation Obligatoire\c[0] à l'intérieur du \c[3]Carrefour des Quêtes\c[0] de Rookie Harbor. C'est obligatoire.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.note: permatask has checked lenght right ? no, but this fits

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: So, how was it, Lea?\. Enjoyed being in space?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Donc, comment c'était, Lea ?\. C'était bien d'être dans l'espace ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Well, now you should understand your task, being part of Track Walker and all.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Bien, maintenant vous devriez comprendre votre travail, en tant que membre du Retraçage et tout.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Let's go to the \c[3]west\c[0] now.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Allons à l'\c[3]ouest\c[0], maintenant.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: By the way, Lea.\. Spheromancer?\. That's surprising.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: D'ailleurs, Lea.\. Spheromanceur ?\. C'est surprenant.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: They're pretty unpopular.\. Don't ask me why - they're fine balance wise.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ils sont assez impopulaires.\. Me demande pas pourquoi - ils sont bien équilibrés pourtant.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: What about Pentafist?\. They're awesome, right?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Et les Pentafists ?\. Ils sont formidables, non ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Japp!\. And I couldn't imagine you in any other class.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Japp !\. Et je pouvais pas t'imaginer prendre une autre classe.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Guard Kima
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Garde Kima

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Kima
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Kima

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker]. I have to keep watch on the market and protect our citizens, so please excuse me.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Bonjour, \v[lore.title.seeker]. Je dois garder un œil sur le marché et protéger les citoyens, donc si vous pouviez m'excuser...

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Kima
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Kima

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Good day, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Are you the reinforcements I was promised?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Bonne journée, \v[lore.title.seeker]. Vous ne seriez pas les renforts que l'on m'a promis ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Finally!\. We got some really pesky thieves at the markets lately, stealing from both the stands and customers.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Enfin !\. En ce moment ici, on a des voleurs au marché, qui volent les marchands et les clients.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: I just saw one committing theft at the stands but he was gone before I could catch him.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: J'en ai déjà vu un commettre un vol à l'étalage, mais il était déjà loin quand je suis arrivée.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: I have to remain here and keep watch, so it's up to you to catch him, understand?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Il faut que je reste ici pour continuer à monter la garde, donc c'est à vous de l'attraper, vous comprenez ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Great. I saw him running towards the small park in the southeast, so go and get that crook!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Bien. Je l'ai vu courir vers le petit parc au sud-est. Donc allez-y, attrapez-moi ce gredin !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Kima
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Kima

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: The thief should be in the small park in the southeast, so go and get him!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Le voleur devrait être dans le petit parc au sud-est, allez l'attraper !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Kima
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Kima

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Damn, I saw that he got away from you.\. What the hell happened there?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Diable, J'ai vu qu'il vous a échappé. Il s'est passé quoi bon sang ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Well, what's done is done.\. I saw him running southwest to a dead-end alley by the sea.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Bon, ce qui est fait est fait.\. Je l'ai vu courir au sud-ouest vers une impasse près de la mer.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Make sure to catch him this time!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Essayez de l'attraper cette fois !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Kima
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Kima

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: I saw him running southwest to a dead-end alley by the sea.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Je l'ai vu courir au sud-ouest vers une impasse près de la mer.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Make sure to catch him this time!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Essayez de l'attraper cette fois !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Kima
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Kima

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: He escaped again?! You've got to finally nail him down, before we become a laughingstock!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Il s'est encore échappé ?! Il faut que vous le chopiez, avant que l'on soit la risée de la ville !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Kima
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Kima

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: I put that scoundrel behind bars, thanks to you!\. You better report back to Sgt. Brassler now.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: J'ai mis ce voyou derrière les barreaux - grâce à vous !\. Vous devriez retourner voir le Sgt. Brassler maintenant.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Kima
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Kima

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Good to see you again, \v[lore.title.seeker]. The market has been rather quiet since we nailed that pickpocket.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Je suis heureux de vous revoir, \v[lore.title.seeker]. Le marché est plutôt calme depuis que l'on a attrapé ce pickpocket.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Shady Shorsh
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Carlos la Carotte

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Shady Shorsh
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Carlos la Carotte

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Hi!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Salut !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Ahh!\. What... what do you want from me?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ahh !\. Qu'est-ce... qu'est-ce que vous me voulez ?
Salut ?\. .\..\.. Lea, salut !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: I...\. I see.\. So you want to arrest me for my crimes?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Je... Je vois.\. Vous voulez m'arrêter, c'est ça ?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.note: de is not understandable, maybe street slang ? 'zubuchten'

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Alright, it was only a matter of time.\. But I just had to earn money somehow for...\. for...\. here let me show you...
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Bon, de toute façon ce n'était qu'une question de temps.\. Mais il fallait bien que je trouve cet argent pour...\. pour...\. laissez-moi vous montrer...

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: ...my speedy escape!\.\. Byeeeee\..\..\..
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: ... ma fuite éclair !\.\. Bye Byeeee\..\..\..

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Mr. Brittles
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: M. Percuté

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Mr. Brittles
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: M. Percuté

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: That mean scoundrel ran past here!\. You must have given him a solid spanking. Good job!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ce voyou vient de passer par là !\. Vous avez dû lui donner une bonne fessée. Bon travail !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Still not satisfied?\. Well, he ran towards \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0] if you wanna whip him some more.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Toujours pas satisfait ?\. Bon, il a couru vers \c[3]\v[area.autumn-area.name]\c[0] au cas où vous n'en auriez pas fini avec lui.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Mr. Brittles
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: M. Percuté

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Young people these days... no manners, I tell you.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Les jeunes de nos jours... plus aucune manière, c'est moi qui vous le dis.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Young people these days have no manners.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Les jeunes de nos jours, ils n'ont plus aucune manière.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Running through the streets \c[5]like they're fleeing from the police\c[0] without regard for others.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: En courant dans les rues \c[5]comme s'ils s'échappaient de la police\c[0] sans respect pour les autres.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Mr. Brittles
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: M. Percuté

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Hi!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Salut !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Hello, young lady.\. Did you also see that unkempt ruffian running through the street like a madman?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Bonjour, jeune demoiselle.\. Vous avez vu aussi cette brute qui courrait comme un fou furieux ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: He was stinking of smoke and looked very suspicious, I tell you!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Il sentait fort la fumée et était très suspect, c'est moi qui vous le dis !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: I saw him running to the southwest to a dead end by the sea if you wanna teach him a lesson.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Je l'ai vu s'en aller au sud-ouest vers un cul-de-sac près de l'eau, si vous voulez lui donner une bonne leçon.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: All this buzzing in the town...
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Tout ce vacarme en ville...

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: What about it, Pa?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Qu'est-ce qu'il y a, Papa ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: I hate it.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Je déteste ça.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Please don't, Pa....
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: S'il te plaît, papa...

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Back in my day...
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: De mon temps...

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: No, don't...
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Arrête ça...

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Back in my day everything was better.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: De mon temps tout était mieux.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Oh boy, here we go again.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Oh non, et c'est reparti...

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: People were nicer, greeting you on the street and everything.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Les gens étaient plus sympa. Ils vous disaient bonjour dans la rue et tout.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Even the \c[5]name of this damn city\c[0] was better.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Même le \c[5]nom de cette satanée ville\c[0] était mieux.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: See? Look at that Seeker just staring at me, like I'm some decorative prop.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Tu vois ? Regarde un peu ce \v[lore.title.seeker]. Il me regarde comme si j'étais une sorte d'objet de décoration.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Ignore him. He just doesn't like it when things change.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ignorez-le. Il n'aime pas quand les choses changent.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: You're damn right! \v[lore.unlock.rookie-harbor.Page-02-01]\c[3]Port Harbor\c[0] was such a nice name for this town.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Tu as parfaitement raison ! \v[lore.unlock.rookie-harbor.Page-02-01]\c[3]Port Harbor\c[0] était un bien meilleur nom pour cette ville !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: But they changed it because of all the Seekers starting their journey here.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Mais ils l'ont changé parce que tous les \v[lore.title.seeker]s commençaient leur voyage ici.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: My only real solace is that I can still enjoy my fish with fresh apples.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ma seule consolation, c'est que je peux encore profiter de mon poisson avec des pommes fraiches.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: You just won't stop...
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Tu n'arrêteras jamais, non ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: I can't stand all these Seekers buzzing around.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Je ne peux pas supporter tous ces \v[lore.title.seeker]s qui courent toujours partout.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Whatever you say, Pa...
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Peu importe, Papa...

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Mr. Nomsworth
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: M. Bonmange

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Mr. Nomsworth
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: M. Bonmange

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Please excuse me, I've got calls to do.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Veuillez m'excuser, j'ai des appels à passer.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Mr. Nomsworth
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: M. Bonmange

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Ah, good day.\. I appreciate your desire to work for us, but you should get your official faction-briefing in \c[3]\v[lore.title.seeker]-Central\c[0] first.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ah, bonjour.\. J'apprécie votre désir de travailler pour nous, mais vous devez d'abord terminer votre introduction officielle aux factions.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Mr. Nomsworth
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: M. Bonmange

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: It is on the ground floor of this huge building here.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: C'est au rez-de-chaussée de ce grand bâtiment là.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Mr. Nomsworth
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: M. Bonmange

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Ah, it is you again.\. Are you interested in assisting me now?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ah, c'est de nouveau vous.\. Êtes-vous intéressée pour nous aider ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: It's a deal then.\. My client requires \c[3]two Fruit and Veggie Sets each\c[0] and also a precious \c[3]Spice Set\c[0] to boot.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: On va faire affaire alors.\. Mon client demande \c[3]deux Cageots de Fruits et de Légumes chacun\c[0] et un \c[3]Cageot d'Épices\c[0] de bonne qualité.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: You can procure them right here on the central market near the fountain.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Vous pouvez vous en procurer juste ici au marché près de la fontaine.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: For the exchange, you will need raw trading materials from the various plants of \v[area.autumn-area.name].
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Pour marchander, vous aurez besoin de matières premières qui viennent de plantes diverses d'\v[area.autumn-area.name].

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [shakes head]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: That is unfortunate.\. But you can change your mind as long as the job is still available for the taking.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: C'est très regrettable.\. Mais vous pouvez changer d'avis tant que le travail reste disponible.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Mr. Nomsworth
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: M. Bonmange

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: You can get all the required goods on the central market near the fountain.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Vous pouvez obtenir toutes les marchandises nécessaires au marché près de la fontaine.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: For the exchange you will need raw trading materials from the various plants of \v[area.autumn-area.name].
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Pour marchander, vous aurez besoin de matières premières qui viennent de plantes diverses d'\v[area.autumn-area.name].

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Mr. Nomsworth
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: M. Bonmange

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: I see you managed to get everything.\. Quickly, go to the \c[3]Pub at the Beginner's Arc\c[0] and give it to the barkeep.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Je vois que vous avez tout obtenu.\. Courez vite vers le \c[3]Pub de l'Arcade des Débutants\c[0], le barman doit déjà vous attendre.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Mr. Nomsworth
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: M. Bonmange

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: I've already gotten the message from our satisfied customer.\. Good job!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: J'ai déjà reçu le message de la part de notre client satisfait.\. Bon travail !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Here is your payment.\. I hope I can count on your future assistance.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Voici votre paiement.\. J'espère que l'on pourra continuer à compter sur vous plus tard.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Mr. Nomsworth
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: M. Bonmange

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Oh my, oh my, oh my!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Oh mon dieu, mon dieu !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Hi!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Salut !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Ah, there you are again.\. I'm currently facing a high priority problem and it is giving me quite the headache.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ah, vous êtes de nouveau là.\. J'ai actuellement un problème de la plus haute importance, qui me donne un grand mal de tête.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: You see, I am waiting for an urgent delivery of fresh ingredients from one of our contracted food collectors.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Il se trouve que j'attends une livraison urgente d'ingrédients frais de la part d'un de nos récolteurs de nourriture sous contrat.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.note: don't blame me, blame the original text

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: An important business lunch will be ruined if she doesn't show up soon!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Un important repas d'affaires va être ruiné s'il ne se montre pas bientôt !
Salut... !?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Yes, thank you for asking.\. It would indeed be very helpful if you could lend me a hand again and keep your eyes open for our collector.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Oui, merci de me l'avoir demandé.\. Ce serait très serviable si vous nous donniez un coup de main à nouveau et que vous trouviez la raison de tout cela.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: She should be somewhere in Autumn's Rise.\. Could you try to find her and examine what happened?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Elle devrait être quelque part à \v[area.autumn-area.name].\. Pouvez-vous essayer de la retrouver et de savoir ce qui se passe ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Excellent! I am expecting swift results.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Excellent ! Je m'attends à un résultat rapide !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [shakes head]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Hrm, it can't be helped then.\. Please come back if you change your mind, this is no joking matter!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Hmpf, Je ne peux rien y faire alors.\. Revenez plus tard si vous changez d'opinion. Vous êtes notre seul espoir pour nous sortir de cette situation !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Mr. Nomsworth
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: M. Bonmange

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Please concentrate on your task at hand.\. Time is of the essence here!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: S'il vous plait, concentrez-vous sur votre tâche actuelle.\. Le temps passe !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Mr. Nomsworth
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: M. Bonmange

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Ah, there you are. I've already received the package. Well done!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ah, vous voilà ! J'ai déjà reçu le paquet. Bien joué !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: This could finally mean a breakthrough for my career, I can feel it in my gut!\. Along with a burning hunger for nutrition.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Cela pourrait finalement être le tournant de ma carrière, je peux le sentir dans mes tripes !\. Ça et aussi que je meurs de faim - Ça s'entend non ? *gargouillements*
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.note: you guessed it, this is de !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: In any case, here is your due reward.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: En tout cas, voici votre récompense bien méritée.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Mr Nomsworth
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: M. Bonmange
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.note: bad duplicate of the same one with Mr.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: By Jove!\. This is your big chance, Philamore.\. All you need to do is find the right...
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Par Jupiter !\. C'est la chance de ta vie, Philamore !\. Tout ce que tu as besoin c'est de trouver le...

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Hi!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Salut !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Ah, it is you again!\. I say, you truly find the most opportune times to accost me.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ah, c'est encore vous ! Je dois dire que vous avez l'art d'être toujours là au bon moment.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: I have another task for you.\. And this time the main headquarters are involved.\. Truly, a huge opportunity!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: J'ai un autre travail pour vous.\. Et cette fois, le siège est impliqué.\. C'est une occasion unique !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: So please lend me your assistance!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Donc, si vous pouviez m'accorder votre soutien !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Oh, what a relief, to hear that from one as reliable as yourself.\. Now the road to success shall be smoothly paved.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ah vous n'imaginez pas à quel point ça me soulage de pouvoir compter sur vous.\. Bon, l'affaire est déjà un peu dans le sac.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: In any case, I cannot tell you much about the mission itself.\. My task was simply to acquire an able helper.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Malheureusement, je ne peux pas vous en dire davantage à propos de la mission.\. On m'a seulement demandé de trouver quelqu'un de compétent pour nous aider.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: So please go to the very North of the \c[3]Alley Quarters\c[0] and enter the \c[3]Traders Kontor\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Donc désolé, mais vous aurez vos instructions en allant au \c[3]Bureau du Commerce\c[0] au nord du \c[3]Quartier des Allées\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Then go upstairs to talk to the high board.\. I will announce your arrival and task so you can enter.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Vous trouverez le bureau des directeurs à l'étage. Je vais annoncer votre venue pour que vous puissiez entrer.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.note: not a business specialist. Raumlichkeiten des vorstands ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: And please, give the board my warmest of regards.\. They will surely appreciate it.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Et n'oubliez pas d'adresser mes salutations cordiales aux directeurs.\. Ils en seront probablement ravis.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [shakes head]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Oh no, what a dilemma.\. Please rethink your decision, there is so much on the line!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Oh non, quel dilemme.\. Si vous pouviez reconsidérer votre choix...\. Il y a tellement de choses en jeu, croyez-moi !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Mr Nomsworth
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: M. Bonmange

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Head to the very North of the \c[3]Alley Quarters\c[0], enter the \c[3]Traders Kontor\c[0] and go \c[3]upstairs\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Allez au \c[3]Bureau du Commerce\c[0] au nord du \c[3]Quartier des Allées\c[0] et montez \c[3]à l'étage\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Please be very professional when talking to the board.\. This is a crucial step in both of our careers.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Et soyez très professionnels en discutant avec les directeurs.\. C'est une étape importante, que ce soit pour ma carrière ou la vôtre.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Mr. Nomsworth
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: M. Bonmange

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker], let me thank you again for your splendid work with the headquarters.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], je tiens à vous remercier pour votre travail formidable.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Hi!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Salut !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: The chairman thanked me most sincerely.\. My promotion is just around the corner, I can almost smell it!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Le président m'a fait plusieurs compliments très sincères. Ma promotion doit être imminente, je le sens !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Mr. Nomsworth
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: M. Bonmange

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Ah, good day, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Pleased to meet you.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ah, bonjour, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Ravi de vous rencontrer.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: My name is Mr. Nomsworth and I am a humble mediative employee of the local trading association.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Mon nom est Monsieur Bonmange et je suis un simple médiateur de l'association des marchands locaux.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Hi!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Salut !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Now, as you might've already assumed, a man of my position is always busy brokering business agreements big and small.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Vous vous en doutiez peut-être, mais une personne comme moi est toujours occupée à négocier des contrats, petits ou grands.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Thus, there's always a need for helping hands willing to do some necessary legwork.\. For a generous payment of course.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Tout cela pour dire qu'on a toujours besoin de personnes prêtes à donner un coup de main et faire un peu de marche. En échange d'un paiement généreux, bien sûr.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Just now I have an unresolved assignment by the Pub for a delivery of mixed food ingredients.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: En ce moment j'ai une commande du Pub en attente d'être honorée pour une livraison de divers ingrédients.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: It requires collecting raw materials in the wild, trading them for the required items here in the market and of course delivering them to my client.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Pour cela, il faut collecter des matières premières dans la nature, les échanger ici au marché contre les objets demandés par le client, puis enfin les livrer.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: A rather simple task, fitting for the beginning of a lucrative relationship, I would say.\. Can I count on your cooperation?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Une tâche assez simple, parfait pour commencer un partenariat lucratif, j'ai envie de dire.\. Est-ce que je peux compter sur votre collaboration ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: It's a deal then.\. My client requires \c[3]two Fruit and Veggie Sets each\c[0] and also a precious \c[3]Spice Set\c[0] to boot.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: On va faire affaire alors.\. Mon client demande \c[3]deux Cageots de Fruit et de Légumes chacun\c[0] et un \c[3]Cageot d'Épices\c[0] de bonne qualité.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: You can procure them right here on the central market near the fountain.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Vous pouvez vous en procurer juste ici au marché près de la fontaine.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: For the exchange, you will need raw trading materials from the various plants of \v[area.autumn-area.name].
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Pour marchander, vous aurez besoin de matières premières qui viennent de plantes diverses d'\v[area.autumn-area.name].

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [shakes head]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: That is unfortunate.\. But you can change your mind as long as the job is still for the taking.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: C'est dommage.\. Mais vous pouvez changer d'avis tant que le poste est disponible.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Lea, chérie!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Lea, chérie !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Hi!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Salut !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Hello, Lea! It's good to see you again.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Bonjour, Lea ! C'est bon de te revoir.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Oui, you almost made me worried!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Oui, je me suis presque fait du souci pour toi !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Now I really wonder what happened with you~
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Maintenant je me demande vraiment ce qui t'es arrivé.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.note: de is like fini les paroles, il s'est passe quoi ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: I guess I should start poking you with questions now!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: J'imagine qu'il est temps de te poser plein de questions maintenant !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Come on, Emilie. I'm sure that would be bothersome.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Allez, Emilie. Je suis sûr que ça va être désagréable.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Oui, oui!\. I was joking!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Oui, oui !\. C'était une blague !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Anyway, I want to show you something! This way!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: En tout cas, je veux te montrer quelque chose ! Par là !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Look up there!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Regarde là-bas !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: They finally opened the \c[3]North of Rookie Harbor\c[0]!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ils ont finalement ouvert le \c[3]Nord de Rookie Harbor\c[0] !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Yes, and you can find even more traders up there!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Oui, et tu trouveras encore plus de marchands qu'ici !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Also, the stores now offer \c[3]better equipment\c[0], since we've beaten Faj'ro Temple.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ah et les marchands proposent maintenant du \c[3]meilleur équipement\c[0] depuis que l'on a battu le Temple de Faj'ro.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Not that you'd \c[1]need any better equipment\c[0], but you never know!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Non pas que tu aies \c[1]besoin de meilleur équipement\c[0], mais bon, on sait jamais !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Oui! And you better make sure to upgrade!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Oui ! Et il va falloir que tu améliores ton équipement !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Because here comes the big news!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Parce qu'on a une bonne nouvelle énorme !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: WE'LL BE GOING ON A \c[3]RAID\c[0]!!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: ON VA ALLER FAIRE UN \c[3]RAID\c[0] !!
... Comment ?!

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Oui! I can hardly believe it myself.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Oui ! J'ai aussi du mal à y croire.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: They found a raid event where players of our level can participate!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ils ont trouvé un Raid où les joueurs de notre niveau peuvent participer !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: That means we'll be fighting together with Lukas, Lin and the others!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ça veut dire que l'on va combattre tous ensemble avec Lukas, Lin et les autres !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: ...Well, kind of. There will be two tracks with two teams running in parallel.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: ... Oui bon pas vraiment. Il y aura deux chemins sur lequel deux équipes iront en parallèle.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Details!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Mais c'est juste un détail !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Anyway, the raid is happening tomorrow. You showed up just in time!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: En tout cas, le raid est pour demain. Tu es arrivée juste à temps !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Uhm... wait.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Euh... Attends.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: You still didn't collect that shade, right?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Tu n'as toujours pas récupéré le symbole, c'est ça ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Drat, you're right!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Mince, tu as raison !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: It's one of the prerequisites to join the raid.\. You first need to collect the \c[3]Green Seed Shade\c[3].
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: C'est l'un des prérequis pour participer au raid.\. Il faut que tu obtiennes le \c[3]Symbole de Feuille Verte\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: You find it in \c[3]Autumn's Fall\c[0]. That's to the north of Rookie Harbor. Just take the exit in \c[3]Rookie Harbor East\c[3].
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Tu le trouveras à \c[3]\v[area.autumn-fall.name]\c[0]. C'est au nord de \v[area.rookie-harbor.name]. Prends juste la \c[3]sortie est\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: That's right, just look for the \c[3]glowing bird statue\c[0]. You can't miss it!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: C'est ça, il faut que tu cherches la \c[3]statue brillante en forme d'oiseau\c[0]. Tu ne peux pas la rater !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Anyway, C'tron and I already did the quest... But I'm fine doing it again with you, if you want.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: ... C'tron et moi avons déjà fait la quête... Mais je veux bien la refaire avec toi, si tu veux.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Same for me! Do you want us to join?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Moi aussi ! Est-ce que tu veux qu'on te rejoigne ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: D'accord! Let's go then!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: D'accord ! Allons-y alors !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [shakes head]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Ah, I see...\. well that's ok! We may just spoil the surprise for you, right?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ah, bon je comprends...\. C'est bon ! Au final on ne ferait que dévoiler la surprise, non ?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.note: that's how i understand it, de says surement/probable

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Ah oui...\. Anyway, please tell us when you collected the Shade!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Ah oui...\. En tout cas, préviens-nous quand tu auras récupéré le Symbole !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Just contact me quickly via D-Link!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Appelle-moi juste par D-Link !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: See you around!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: À plus tard !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Au revoir!
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Au revoir !

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [yes]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [oui]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: [no]
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: [non]

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Enter \c[3]Autumn's Fall\c[0] via the exit in \c[3]Rookie Harbor East\c[0] and find the \c[3]statue\c[0]. It has a quest for you.
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Prenez la \c[3]sortie Est de \v[area.rookie-harbor.name]\c[0] vers \c[3]\v[area.autumn-fall.name]\c[0] et trouvez la \c[3]Statue\c[0]. Elle a une quête pour vous.

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Replica Fountain
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Réplique de Fontaine

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Hey you, are you interested in something real special?
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Hé, psst, vous êtes intéressée par quelque chose de vraiment spécial ?

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig: Challenge Note
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Note sur le Défi

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig:
The duel will take place at
\c[3]Autumn's Fall - Eastern Exit\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text: Le duel aura lieu à la \c[3]Sortie Est d'\v[area.autumn-fall.name]\c[0].

maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.orig:
The duel shall start 
when the area has been 
\c[3]ridden of all other opponents\c[0].
maps/rookie-harbor/center.json/entities/.text:
Le duel commencera
lorsque la zone aura été
\c[3]débarrassée de tous les autres adversaires\c[0].
